ops.raw: d0 a8 00 2d fe ab fc 50 01 2d fe ab fc

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // Over the course of many years,
Mako energy will crystallize into
Materia…

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.
